data.actual_result: Long Strings are displayed with a "...", making it hard to understand what the option means
data.expected_result: Long Strings like "Hide Muted Channels" wrap into a new line, like e.g the message rightclick modal already does
data.short_description: Right Click Modals do not wrap with non-English Strings but instead get truncated
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your language to German - Rightclick a Server - Observe
